abstract: Secretary of Defense Ashton B Carter criticizes China for building military structures on reefs and outcroppings in South China Sea; warns actions will bring regional countries together and increase demand for American engagement in effort to maintain security in Asia-Pacific region.
lead_paragraph: Comments left little doubt that Washington shared the concerns of other Asian nations about China’s growing military presence in disputed areas of the South China Sea.

headline.main: U.S. Rebukes China on Efforts to Build Artificial Islands
headline.print_headline: U.S. Rebukes China on Efforts to Build Artificial Islands

snippet: Comments left little doubt that Washington shared the concerns of other Asian nations about China’s growing military presence in disputed areas of the South China Sea.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
